trans-unit.source: Represents a control that provides a scroll bar that has a sliding <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> whose position corresponds to a value.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en kontroll som gir en rullefeltet som har en glidende <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> der posisjonen tilsvarer en verdi.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a ScrollBar control.
trans-unit.target: Illustrasjonen nedenfor viser en rullefeltet.

trans-unit.source: ![Scrollbar illustration](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "Scrollbar illustration") The ScrollBar control contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.
trans-unit.target: ![Rullefeltet illustrasjonen](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "rullefeltet illustrasjonen") i rullefeltet inneholder en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control consists of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control and two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>kontrollen består av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>kontroll og to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>Kontroller.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: You can increase and decrease the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property of the ScrollBar control by pressing the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls or by moving the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan øke og redusere den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>for rullefeltet ved å trykke den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>Kontroller eller ved å flytte <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default range of values for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property is from 0 to 1.
trans-unit.target: Standard verdiområdet for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>egenskapen er fra 0 til 1.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> represents the linear distance of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> between the endpoints of the ScrollBar.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>representerer lineære avstanden for de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>mellom endepunktene på rullefeltet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can change the default range of values by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre det standard verdiområdet ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A> property determines whether the ScrollBar is displayed horizontally or vertically, and you must define this property for the ScrollBar control to appear.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A>egenskapen bestemmer om rullefeltet vises vannrett eller loddrett, og du må angi denne egenskapen for rullefeltet skal vises.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> in a ScrollBar is oriented so that values increase from top to bottom for a vertical ScrollBar or from left to right for a horizontal ScrollBar.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>i en rullefeltet er innrettet slik at verdier øker fra topp til bunn for en loddrett rullefeltet eller fra venstre mot høyre for en vannrette rullefeltet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties in the following table are the binding targets for the corresponding ScrollBar properties when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> property is not explicitly defined.
trans-unit.target: Det <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>i tabellen nedenfor er binding mål for de tilsvarende rullefelt egenskapene når det <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A>egenskapen ikke er eksplisitt definert.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: If you explicitly define the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> property, the binding does not occur.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du eksplisitt definerer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A>egenskapen bindingen ikke finnes.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A>

trans-unit.source: |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> property|ScrollBar property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| You can access the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control of a ScrollBar control by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>egenskapen | Rullefeltet egenskapen | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| Du har tilgang til den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>kontroll over rullefeltet ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: To display <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> content inside a box that has scroll bars, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.
trans-unit.target: Til å vise <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>innhold i en med side-felt, brukes den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ScrollBar Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ScrollBar controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Tilpasning av rullefeltet kontrollen til gjelder samme egenskapsinnstillingene flere rullefeltet kontroller, bruk av <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre standard <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>slik at kontrollen en unik virkning.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om hvordan du oppretter en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, se [tilpasse utseendet til en eksisterende kontroll ved å opprette en ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ScrollBar, see [ScrollBar Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil se delene og statusene som er spesifikke for rullefeltet, kan du se [rullefeltet stiler og maler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Avhengighet egenskapene for denne kontrollen, kan angis ved kontrollens standardstilen.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en egenskap er satt av en standardstilen, kan endre egenskapen standardverdi når kontrollen vises i applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Standardstilen er avhengig av hvilken stasjonær tema brukes når programmet kjører.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se [standard WPF oppsett](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ScrollBar control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Angi en visual egenskap trenger bare en effekt hvis egenskapen er begge finnes i rullefeltet kontrollens standardmalen og angis ved hjelp av en.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner en liste over visual egenskaper i delen "Endring i Visual strukturen av et kontroll" [tilpasse utseendet til en eksisterende kontroll ved å opprette en ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The command that notifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> that the user is dragging the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> of the horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> to the value that is provided in <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter*>.
trans-unit.target: Kommandoen varsler den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> som brukeren flytting av <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> på vannrett <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> til verdien som er angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter*>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter*>

trans-unit.source: When the user drags the thumb of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> calls <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> for the DeferScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren drar tips for en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>kall <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>for DeferScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> returns `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> executes that command.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>returnerer `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>utfører denne kommandoen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> returns `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> executes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>returnerer `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>utfører <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> uses this command to enable deferred scrolling.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>bruker denne kommandoen til å aktivere utsatt rulling.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `true` and a user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> does not change until the user releases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: Når <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>er `true` og en bruker drar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>innholdet i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>ikke endres før brukeren slipper <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If deferred scrolling is enabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> executes the DeferScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand for a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> when the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis utsatt rulling er aktivert, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>utfører DeferScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand for en vannrett <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>når brukeren drar <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The command that notifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> that the user is dragging the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> of the vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> to the value that is provided in <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter*>.
trans-unit.target: Kommandoen varsler den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> som brukeren flytting av <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> i loddrett <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> til verdien som er angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter*>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter*>

trans-unit.source: When the user drags the thumb of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> calls <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> for the DeferScrollToVerticalOffsetCommand.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren drar tips for en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>kall <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>for DeferScrollToVerticalOffsetCommand.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> returns `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> executes that command.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>returnerer `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>utfører denne kommandoen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>

trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>returnerer `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>utfører <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToVerticalOffsetCommand>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToVerticalOffsetCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> uses this command to enable deferred scrolling.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>bruker denne kommandoen til å aktivere utsatt rulling.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `true` and a user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> does not change until the user releases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: Når <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>er `true` og en bruker drar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>innholdet i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>ikke endres før brukeren slipper <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If deferred scrolling is enabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> executes the DeferScrollToVerticalOffsetCommand for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> when the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis utsatt rulling er aktivert, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>utfører DeferScrollToVerticalOffsetCommand for en loddrett <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>når brukeren drar <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: This implementation sets IsEnabledCore to `true` only if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> is greater than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> value and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Denne implementeringen angir IsEnabledCore til `true` bare hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>er større enn den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>verdi og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>er aktivert.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> is enabled in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> and the size of the content is larger than the display area; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> er aktivert i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> og størrelsen på innholdet som er større enn visningsområdet; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The command that scrolls a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> by a small amount in the vertical direction of increasing value of its <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kommandoen som ruller en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> av litt i vertikal retning øker verdien for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This command increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne kommandoen øker den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>av den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>av verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A>egenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: This command occurs when the user presses the DOWN ARROW key.
trans-unit.target: Denne kommandoen forekommer når brukeren trykker pil.

trans-unit.source: When you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> executes this command.
trans-unit.target: Når du har implementert en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>som en del av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>kontroll, den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>utfører denne kommandoen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.target: ## XAML teksten Bruk `<` *objektet* *egenskapen*`="`**ScrollBar.LineDownCommand**`"/>`

trans-unit.source: Occurs one or more times as content scrolls in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> when the user moves the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*> by using the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer én eller flere ganger som innhold ruller i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> når brukeren flytter i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>ved hjelp av musen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>

trans-unit.source: This event typically occurs multiple times when the user changes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> by dragging the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>.

trans-unit.source: There is no limit to the number of times this event is raised as the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> position is dragged.
trans-unit.target: Det er ingen grense for antall ganger denne hendelsen oppstår som den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>posisjon drar.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event is not raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control is changed in code.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> for en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A typical style template for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control includes a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that is surrounded on either side by two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> controls.
trans-unit.target: En stilmal for vanlige for en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>kontrollen inneholder en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>kontrollen som er omsluttet på begge sider av to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>Kontroller.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> that is used with a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> som brukes med en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of the scrollable content that is currently visible.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvor mye rullbare innholdet som vises i øyeblikket.

trans-unit.source: The units that are used for ViewportSize are the same units that are used to describe the length of the content.
trans-unit.target: Enheter som er brukt for ViewportSize er i samme enhet som brukes til å beskrive lengden på innholdet.

trans-unit.source: Some examples include lines of text or pages of text.
trans-unit.target: Noen eksempler linjer eller sider i teksten.

trans-unit.source: The value of the ViewportSize property is used to calculate the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control that is displayed as the sliding value indicator in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen ViewportSize brukes til å beregne størrelsen på den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>kontrollen som vises som indikatoren glidende verdien i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control's size represents the amount of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control's content that is visible.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>kontrollens størrelsen representerer hvor mye en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>kontrollens innhold som er synlig.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: If 25 percent of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control's content is visible, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> occupies 25 percent of the track in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis 25 prosent av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>kontrollens innhold er synlig, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>tar 25 prosent av sporet i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: You can decide which units ViewportSize uses.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi hvilke enheter ViewportSize bruker.

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, make sure that the ViewportSize, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> properties use the same units.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir denne egenskapen, må du kontrollere at ViewportSize, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>Egenskaper bruke samme enhet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> size reflects the amount of content that is visible.
trans-unit.target: Illustrasjonen nedenfor viser hvordan <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>Størrelse gjenspeiler hvor mye innhold som er synlig.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.target: ![Sporlengden og thumbsize for en rullefeltet](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsize.png "Sporlengden og thumbsize for en rullefeltet") ## egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.target: Mengden av rullbare innholdet som vises i øyeblikket.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0.
